name: Cafe's Command
description:
The year is 1989.

The United States government has received note of a break-in at one of their servers, which contain vital documents and files.

The documents have been traced to a server, owned by CAFE, a small coffee company, in New York...

You, a trusted hacker, hired by the U.S. government must connect to CAFE's server, and destroy the stolen documents, through a terminal, and unearth the mysteries of the odd CAFE company.

---

Use the 'help' command to get a list of all valid commands, and their usage.

(Note: Sometimes the console might not execute your command properly. It is relatively rare, but if this happens, just re-enter the command.)

---

If you are having difficulty getting the game to run, make sure the .jar file is in the same folder as the .wav files and the 'C' folder. If that still doesn't work, right click the .jar file, then chose "open with -> Choose another app", then select java as the default application to run. It should work now.

https://github.com/CorkScrewer/Cafe-s-Command

Here's the source code if anyone wants.
